languages.text: "Довольно слов, элантах. Ты отмахнул{mf|ся|ась} от моего предупреждения, и душу твою от скверны уже не спасти. Оставаясь подле, я рискую навеки пасть в объятья Той, Что Жаждет. На этом наши пути расходятся — прощай и лучше не ищи со мной встречи".

"Enough words, elantach. You have brushed my warning aside, and now there is no saving your soul from corruption any longer. If I remained at your side, I would risk forever falling into the embrace of She Who Thirsts. Our ways part here. Farewell, and you would be wise not to seek another meeting with me."
languages.original_text: "Довольно слов, элантах. Ты отмахнул{mf|ся|ась} от моего предупреждения, и душу твою от скверны уже не спасти. Оставаясь подле, я рискую навеки пасть в объятья Той, Что Жаждет. На этом наши пути расходятся — прощай и лучше не ищи со мной встречи".

traits.locale_text: "Enough words, elantach. You brushed my warning aside, and now there is no saving your soul from corruption anymore. If I remained at your side, I would risk forever falling into the embrace of Her Who Thirsts. Our ways part here. Farewell, and you will be wise to not seek to meet me again."

If I remained at your side, I would risk forever falling into the embrace of She Who Thirsts. Our ways part here. Farewell, and you would be wise not to seek another meeting with me."

"Enough words, elantach. You have brushed my warning aside, and now there is no saving your soul from corruption any longer. If I remained at your side, I would risk forever falling into the embrace of She Who Thirsts. Our ways part here. Farewell, and you would be wise not to seek another meeting with me."

languages.text: “够了，外界人。你对我的警告置之不理，如今你的灵魂已经彻底腐化，无药可救了。如果我继续留在你身边，我的灵魂恐怕就会永远落入饥渴女士的巨口。我们就此别过吧。永别了，希望你永远也不要再来找我了。”
languages.original_text: "Enough words, elantach. You have brushed my warning aside, and now there is no saving your soul from corruption any longer. If I remained at your side, I would risk forever falling into the embrace of She Who Thirsts. Our ways part here. Farewell, and you would be wise not to seek another meeting with me."

traits.locale_text: “够了，外界人。你对我的警告置之不理，如今你的灵魂已经无药可救了。如果我继续留在你身边，我的灵魂恐怕就会永远落入饥渴女士的巨口。我们就此别过吧。永别了，希望你永远也不要再来找我了。”

languages.text: 「もう十分だ、エランタ。お前は私の警告を無視し続けた。もう、お前の魂を腐敗から救うのは不可能だ。お前の側に居続けては、〈かの渇きたる女〉の抱擁に落ちる危険を冒す。別れの時が来たようだ。さらば。もう、私の事は探すな」
languages.original_text: "Enough words, elantach. You have brushed my warning aside, and now there is no saving your soul from corruption any longer. If I remained at your side, I would risk forever falling into the embrace of She Who Thirsts. Our ways part here. Farewell, and you would be wise not to seek another meeting with me."

traits.locale_text: 「もう十分だ、エランタ。お前は私の警告を無視し続けた。もう、お前の魂を腐敗から救うのは不可能だ。お前の側に居続けては、”渇きし彼女”の抱擁に落ちる危険を冒す。別れの時が来たようだ。さらば。もう、私の事は探すな」

languages.text: «Ya basta, elantach. Has hecho caso omiso a mi advertencia y ahora ya no hay forma de salvar tu alma de la corrupción. Si permaneciera a tu lado, me arriesgaría a caer para siempre en los brazos de la Sedienta. Nuestras sendas se separan aquí. Adiós. Harás bien en no buscar un nuevo encuentro conmigo».
languages.original_text: "Enough words, elantach. You have brushed my warning aside, and now there is no saving your soul from corruption any longer. If I remained at your side, I would risk forever falling into the embrace of She Who Thirsts. Our ways part here. Farewell, and you would be wise not to seek another meeting with me."

traits.locale_text: «Ya basta, elantach. Has hecho caso omiso a mi advertencia y ahora ya no hay forma de salvar tu alma de la corrupción. Si permaneciera a tu lado, me arriesgaría a caer para siempre en los brazos de la Sedienta. Nuestros caminos se separan aquí. Adiós. Harás bien en no buscarme de nuevo».

languages.text: "Genug der Worte, Elantach. Ihr habt meine Warnung beiseite gewischt, und nun lässt sich Eure Seele nicht mehr vor der Verderbnis retten. Würde ich an Eurer Seite bleiben, so würde ich riskieren, für immer in die Umarmung von Ihr, die Dürstet, zu fallen. Unsere Wege trennen sich hier. Lebt wohl. Und ich rate Euch, kein weiteres Treffen mit mir zu erbitten."
languages.original_text: "Enough words, elantach. You have brushed my warning aside, and now there is no saving your soul from corruption any longer. If I remained at your side, I would risk forever falling into the embrace of She Who Thirsts. Our ways part here. Farewell, and you would be wise not to seek another meeting with me."

traits.locale_text: "Genug der Worte, Elantach. Ihr habt meine Warnung beiseite gewischt, und nun lässt sich Eure Seele nicht mehr vor der Verderbnis retten. Würde ich an Eurer Seite bleiben, so würde ich riskieren, für immer in die Umarmung von Ihr, die Dürstet, zu fallen. Unsere Wege trennen sich hier. Lebt wohl, und Ihr tätet gut daran, mir nie wieder zu begegnen."

languages.text: « Assez parlé, elantach. Vous avez balayé mon avertissement d'un revers de la main et maintenant, votre âme est au-delà de toute rédemption. Si je devais rester à vos côtés, je risquerais de succomber à l'Assoiffée. Nos chemins se séparent donc ici. Adieu, et pour votre propre bien, ne cherchez pas à me retrouver. »
languages.original_text: "Enough words, elantach. You have brushed my warning aside, and now there is no saving your soul from corruption any longer. If I remained at your side, I would risk forever falling into the embrace of She Who Thirsts. Our ways part here. Farewell, and you would be wise not to seek another meeting with me."

traits.locale_text: « Assez parlé, elantach. Vous avez balayé mon avertissement d'un revers de la main et maintenant, votre âme est au-delà de toute rédemption. Si je devais rester à vos côtés, je risquerais de succomber à l'Assoiffée. Nos chemins se séparent donc ici. Adieu, et pour votre propre bien, ne cherchez pas à me retrouver. »
